message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm offering it at $11,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this work. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
